about_the_game:
Now you favorite characters comes in new flavors! nom nom !
The Match3 Puzzle adventure everyone loves is now available in your pc,
get ready to get challenged and charmed by the sanic gang characters.
Lot of fun, lot of characters! Lot Levels awaits for you!
Touch them and make them pop , complete the goals and get rewards!
Use power ups to pass through those annoying levels and discover the new areas.
Touch two or three blocks from the same color and a explosion of flavor will appear, collect the goals !.
Shedew and Big da Cat are here too ! , they will help you to beat the goals and break your best records everytiime

There are so many flavors! :
cherry knukls
banana taels
sweet sanic
strawberry Ame Roes
Bittersweet robotknik.

pls, share and tell your friends , it will help me a lot !
detailed_description:
Now you favorite characters comes in new flavors! nom nom !
The Match3 Puzzle adventure everyone loves is now available in your pc,
get ready to get challenged and charmed by the sanic gang characters.
Lot of fun, lot of characters! Lot Levels awaits for you!
Touch them and make them pop , complete the goals and get rewards!
Use power ups to pass through those annoying levels and discover the new areas.
Touch two or three blocks from the same color and a explosion of flavor will appear, collect the goals !.
Shedew and Big da Cat are here too ! , they will help you to beat the goals and break your best records everytiime

There are so many flavors! :
cherry knukls
banana taels
sweet sanic
strawberry Ame Roes
Bittersweet robotknik.

pls, share and tell your friends , it will help me a lot !

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (Intel processors)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur 11.0
  • Processor: Apple M1 or above (Apple silicon-based processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Popit Sanic Goo!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Dual core CPU X64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs, 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: An awesome and colorful Match 3 adventure with lot of characters and powerups, make them pop and unlock new areas and levels, some are relaxing and others are challenging. Ame roes, taels, big da cat , shedew and more are here!
